mapper.select: SELECT S.BND_ITEM_CD "채권코드", C.EXP_DT "만기일", S.BND_ITEM_NM "채권이름", S.WGT "비중", S.YLD "YIELD", S.EVL_PRC "평가가격", S.EVL_PRC_NAV "NAV평가가격", NVL(S.B_TRD_DT, '할인채') "최근이자지급일", NVL(B.INT_PMNT_AMT, '') "이자", DECODE(S.WGT, 0, '편출', '편입') "편입여부" FROM (SELECT A.BND_ITEM_CD, A.BND_ITEM_NM, A.WGT, A.YLD, A.EVL_PRC, A.EVL_PRC_NAV, (SELECT MIN (TRD_DT) FROM BD_BND_INT_PMNT WHERE BND_ITEM_CD = A.BND_ITEM_CD AND TRD_DT >= #{trd_dt}) AS B_TRD_DT FROM VA_BND_IDX_ITEM_HIST A WHERE A.TRD_DT = #{trd_dt} AND A.IDX_CD = #{idx_cd}) S, BD_BND_INT_PMNT B, FNB_BOND_INFO C WHERE S.BND_ITEM_CD = B.BND_ITEM_CD(+) AND S.B_TRD_DT = B.TRD_DT(+) AND S.BND_ITEM_CD = C.ITEMCD ORDER BY S.WGT DESC
SELECT TRD_DT, CLS_PRC FROM VA_BND_IDX_DL A WHERE A.IDX_CD = #{idx_cd} AND A.TRD_DT >= TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{trd_dt}), #{interval}), 'YYYYMMDD') ORDER BY A.TRD_DT ASC
